name: Astonishing Football 22
description:
Astonishing Football is just like football, but on your smartphone or tablet. Become the manager of your own football team, and lead your players to the ultimate reward: becoming the best coach and winning the Football Cup!


The squad of your dreams
Astonishing Football allows you to create the team you've always dreamed of. Make trades with the greedy other teams of the league, or sign free agents during the offseason. Draft talented prospects and elevate them to the rank of all-star during the Legends Contest. You're the coach!

Deep Gameplay for football fans
Astonishing Football is very easy to learn. If you know the game rules, you'll know how to play! You can take every play decisions in the game, trying to be smarter than your opponent, or leave it to your coaches to find the best strategies.
Want to go deeper? AF22 even comes with the possibility to create your own custom plays!

Play when you want, where you want
Astonishing Football can be played offline, as much as you want. You don't need to wait between games. You don't need a data connection to save a game result. You don't need to watch an ad to play an extra game. You don't need to create an account to build your team. Just play now!

Prove you're the best
If you're also looking for online competition, AF22 is definitely for you! Play unlimited practice games with your friends, become the world best player in ranked mode, or become the King of Football in the Astonishing Contest!

Follow the scoreboard, the rankings, and the reactions from the fans, Astonishing Football reporters and players. You can also post your statistics online to compare your performances to other GMs in our daily and weekly leaderboards!

A Tremendous Rivalry
Maybe you're going to have success with your team, but at the top of your fame, a talented coach might come to steal your throne! Will you be good enough to get him out of this league?

Enjoy the game!
Join our Discord server: https://discord.astonishing-sports.app
